item.description:
Just another Bike ride on the state forest trails.

Mountain Bikes recommended.

Kids under 7 aren't... ,kidding theyre welcome but they might have a tough time. The ride will be about 2hours long and there are some hills. Not too big but enough to get you peddling.

No rain date... if it rains heavily enough we'll hike with Jackets on.
item.how_to_find_us: Look For My Blue Toyota Sienna Van with the Bike Rack

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Bike Ride - Myles Standish State Forest. - Kid Friendly
